title: Hagerman Fossil Beds National Monument: Parks as Classrooms
body: Parks as Classrooms        Field Trips Hagerman Fossil Beds offers a variety of fun and exciting educational opportunities for school and youth groups. Ranger-led field trips are offered throughout the year depending upon staffing levels. The best time of year to schedule a field trip is Sept - Oct and April - May. Please contact us for information about the programs we offer and to schedule your visit. All Field Trips   Students Excavate for Fossils    Field Trips Learn More     Guest Speakers Invite a ranger to come and give a presentation to your classroom, school, or organization.  Park Rangers are ready to provide you with a varitey of programs to meet your needs and goals. All Guest Speakers   A Park Ranger presents a program to school children.    Guest Speakers Learn More     Traveling Trunks Borrow our traveling trunk filled with curriculum materials and activities created to help you enhance and reinforce your fossil lessons. All Traveling Trunks   Hagerman's Fun Fossil Traveling Trunk    Hagerman's Fun Fossil Traveling Trunk Learn More
